4. From the filtered table, find the longest serving actors. To do this, compare the durations of all actors from "un posto al sole". The longest duration should be greater than or equal to 15 years (since Marina Tagliaferri has been acting for 15 years in "un posto al sole").

5. Check if all these longest-serving actors started their tenure in 2003 or later. To do this, compare the start year of each actor with 2003. If the start year is either equal to or greater than 2003, then they meet the criterion for starting their tenure in 2003 or later.

6. If all longest-serving actors from "un posto al sole" have a start year of 2003 or later, the claim is TRUE; otherwise, it is FALSE.

Since both Marina Tagliaferri and Claudia Ruffo have a start year prior to 2003, they do not meet the criterion for starting in 2003 or later.

Since none of the longest serving actors from "un posto al sole" started their tenure in 2003 or later, the claim is FALSE.
